original_text: Therefore the Lord has kept ready the calamity and has brought it upon us, for the Lord our God is righteous in all the works that he has done, and we have not obeyed his voice.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 이 재앙을 간직하여 두셨다가 우리에게 내리게 하셨사오니 우리의 하나님 여호와께서 행하시는 모든 일이 공의로우시나 우리가 그 목소리를 듣지 아니하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: Therefore the Lord has kept ready the calamity
and has brought it upon us
for the Lord our God is righteous
in all the works that he has done
and we have not obeyed his voice
